A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow! I was so disappointed in this movie that I'm actually going to write a review. This was a slap to the face to the fans.  If the movie was the first of its trilogy I would understand a few things but making so many random things in a middle of a trilogy was just a bad move. At this point I don't even care for episode 9 (I'll probably watch anyway) but I don't care about Rey anymore. Anyway\, this movie really left a bad taste in my mouth.
